name: Monkey.D.Garp
text: On Play: If your Leader is [Monkey.D.Luffy], [Sabo] or [Portgas.D.Ace], look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a cost of 3 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
